_header: Out of darkness I will lead thee
_description: ‘By the Grace of God’, alchemical verses — 21 lines followed by prose commentary

PhilUPSmith4.First Lines:
owte of darkness I will leade theewhy sekeste thowe þat
                    þat allwayes is with thee…
PhilUPSmith4.Last Lines:
…& thre times so muche of þe Egle& sethe them
                    well vpon þe fyer
PhilUPSmith4.Note:
21 lines, 9 couplets and a triplet, followed by prose
                    commentary.
